revised_title: Phosphoric Acid and Potash in Wheat Soils: A Chemical Study
tldr: This study investigates the phosphoric acid and potash content in wheat soils at Rothamsted's Broadbalk Field. The research examines the effects of various manurial and cropping conditions on the availability of these nutrients for plant growth. The findings provide valuable insights into soil fertility and agricultural practices.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Soil Science
